subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Amputation
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Kevin Laue, a 6-foot-10-inch college basketball prospect from California who was born with a left arm that ended at the elbow, is trying to get noticed for another reason.
snippet: Kevin Laue, a 6-foot-10-inch college basketball prospect from California who was born with a left arm that ended at the elbow, is trying to get noticed for another reason.
